items.title: Automation Vault
items.description:
Real Estate
‚Ä¢	Lendlord AI: AI-assistant for UK property investment: valuations, deal comparisons, cash-flow analysis, alerts. Useful for screening and comparing multiple investment properties quickly. https://lendlord.io/solutions/invest/lendlord-ai Lendlord+2Lendlord+2
‚Ä¢	Free Excel deal-analyser spreadsheets: Not a specific tool but templates you can download (for example via PaTMa: ‚ÄúFree Property Deal Analyser Spreadsheet‚Äù). Useful for modelling yield, ROI, refurbishment + hold vs sell scenarios. https://www.patma.co.uk/blog/free-property-deal-analyser-spreadsheet/ PaTMa
 
Jobs / Lifestyle Automation
‚Ä¢	JobCopilot: AI tool that automates job search & job application forms, filtering and applying automatically. Useful if you want to explore new opportunities while minimising time spent on applications. https://jobcopilot.com/automate-job-applications/ 
‚Ä¢	PromptDrive: Workspace to manage, organise and share AI-prompts (for ChatGPT / Claude / Gemini) and collaborate with team. Useful for building a prompt library, workflow, re-use and scaling your prompt-use. PromptDrive.ai
‚Ä¢	Notion: (General tool) Task / project / database workspace. Useful as the central hub of your lifestyle / automation workflows (holding tasks, workflows, linking tools). The AI workspace that works for you. | Notion
 
Finance
‚Ä¢	Prospero AI: AI investing app that provides stock picks, signals, trend-recognition from institutional data. Useful for your trading/investment side to identify opportunities and save time on research. https://prospero.ai/ Prospero.ai
‚Ä¢	Intuit Assist: AI assistant embedded in financial tools (QuickBooks etc) to help automate finance tasks ‚Äî invoices, expenses, cash flow. Useful for automating the admin side of your businesses. Intuit Assist - A new generative AI-powered financial assistant | Intuit
‚Ä¢	Midday: Business operations automation tool that covers invoicing, time-tracking, project/file management. Useful for your automated business workflows so you spend less on manual tasks. Midday | Run your business smarter
 
Education
‚Ä¢	Unstuck AI (also appears as Unstuck Study AI): Upload lectures/PPTs/videos/PDFs and get summaries, flashcards, interactive study tools. Useful for your boxing/martial arts learning or general self-improvement. https://unstuckstudyai.com/ Unstuck Study AI
‚Ä¢	Plagiarism Check: Tool investigating or checking plagiarism/AI-written content. Useful in education setting for maintaining originality. Plagiarism Checker AI - Check 5000, 10000 Words Free

Travel
‚Ä¢	Trip Planner AI: AI tool to build personalised travel itineraries (vacation, multi-city, road-trip) optimised for preferences. Useful for your high-adrenaline Southeast Asia trip planning with friends. https://tripplanner.ai/ 
‚Ä¢	iMean AI Cheap Flight Finder	Uses AI to scan real-time flight prices across platforms + supports flexible dates, multi-destination & hidden-deal searches. 	iMean Cheap Flight Finder

‚Ä¢	
 
Files & Spreadsheets
‚Ä¢	GPT Excel: AI-powered spreadsheet assistant ‚Äì integrates GPT into Excel/Google Sheets to automate formulas, data extraction. Useful across your property, investing and admin workflows when you want to avoid building everything manually. GPT Excel - AI Powered Excel formula Generator
‚Ä¢	Bank Statement Extractor into Excel: Tool that takes bank statements and extracts structured data into Excel for analysis. Useful for tracking finances, expenses, especially for your property business or sports-massage income. PDF Editor - Edit Transform, Annotate your PDFs Online - PDF Guru
‚Ä¢	Free rental income & expense tracker (Excel template): From Landlord Vision. Useful for managing rental property finances in spreadsheet form. https://www.landlordvision.co.uk/resource-centre/free-rental-income-and-expense-tracker.html

items.title: Income Vault
items.description:
Trident FX: Automated Copy-Trading Systems
Trident FX provides secure, automated systems that connect clients to experienced professional day traders.
Our technology allows trades from verified professionals to be copied directly onto a client‚Äôs account ‚Äî automatically, in real time, and with full control remaining in the client‚Äôs hands.
Each system is designed with strong risk management, transparency, and compliance in mind, following standards aligned with UK FCA expectations.
 
üß† Trading Sync ‚Äî Lower-Risk Automated System
Overview
Trading Sync is built for long-term, steady results with controlled risk.
It automatically copies the trades of selected professional day traders who focus on consistency and discipline rather than short-term speculation.
Key Features
‚Ä¢	Purpose: Designed for users who prefer steady, lower-risk growth.
‚Ä¢	Automation: All trades are copied automatically through secure broker connections.
‚Ä¢	Risk Management: Trade sizes and exposure limits are carefully controlled.
‚Ä¢	Transparency: Every trade and result can be viewed live in your own account.
Safeguards
‚Ä¢	Clients always keep full control and access to their funds.
‚Ä¢	Strategies are reviewed regularly for risk and performance.
‚Ä¢	No funds are pooled ‚Äî all trading stays in the client‚Äôs personal account.

Contact Ethan Cheyne: 07572386578
 
üîí Compliance Statement
Trident FX provides technology for automated trade copying.
We do not give financial advice, manage investments, or guarantee profits.
All trading carries risk. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
Clients should seek independent financial advice if unsure whether automated trading is suitable for them.

üß© Outplayed Platform (Optional Income Tool)

Overview
Outplayed is a UK-based automation platform that helps users generate consistent, low-risk income through matched betting and casino reward optimisation.
Both methods rely on utilising bookmaker and casino promotions ‚Äî not luck ‚Äî to create predictable, risk-managed profits.
It operates entirely within UK regulations and is widely recognised as a legitimate income model, turning marketing offers from bookmakers and casinos into financial advantage through data-driven automation.

 
‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1.	Matched Betting
o	Outplayed tracks bookmaker promotions and free bets across major UK sites.
o	Users (or automated scripts) place two opposite bets ‚Äî one at the bookmaker and one at a betting exchange ‚Äî covering all outcomes of the event.
o	The free bet or promotion value becomes locked-in profit, removing the gambling element entirely.
2.	Casino Offers & Free Spins
o	Outplayed also identifies ‚Äúlow-risk‚Äù or ‚Äúpositive expected value‚Äù casino promotions, such as free spins, deposit bonuses, and cashback rewards.
o	It analyses the mathematical edge and provides instructions (or automation) to execute these offers safely and systematically.
o	Over time, this creates an additional, compounding stream of small, consistent profits.
 
üí° Benefits
‚úÖ Low-Risk Income Stream ‚Äî When followed correctly, returns are predictable and not based on chance.
‚úÖ Fully Legal in the UK ‚Äî Recognised by HMRC; compliant with UK gambling and promotions law.
‚úÖ Automation Ready ‚Äî Advanced accounts use built-in automation to track and execute offers efficiently.
‚úÖ Casino Free Spins & Rewards ‚Äî Expands beyond sports offers, turning casino bonuses into genuine financial value.
‚úÖ No Experience Needed ‚Äî Designed for beginners with step-by-step support.
‚úÖ Diversification ‚Äî Provides an additional income avenue that is not correlated with financial market trading.
 
‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes
‚Ä¢	Outplayed is not a financial trading or investment product.
‚Ä¢	It operates entirely in the consumer promotions and betting-offer sector.
‚Ä¢	Individual results vary depending on available promotions and user consistency.
‚Ä¢	Users should always follow platform guidance and risk-control measures carefully.
